fields.name: spam
fields.description_en: Posts as spam could include clickbait, advertising, scams, script bots
fields.description_es: Posts as spam could include clickbait, advertising, scams, script bots

fields.name: pornography
fields.description_en: Posts showing sexual intercourse, photos and videos of sexual intercourse, nudity etc
fields.description_es: Posts showing sexual intercourse, photos and videos of sexual intercourse, nudity etc

fields.name: hatred_bullying
fields.description_en: Credible threats, targets people, degrades or shames them, harassment etc.
fields.description_es: Credible threats, targets people, degrades or shames them, harassment etc.

fields.name: self_harm
fields.description_en: Posts promoting or encouraging self harm
fields.description_es: Posts promoting or encouraging self harm

fields.name: violence
fields.description_en: Photos or videos of extreme graphic violence, posts encouraging violence, specific threats of physical harm
fields.description_es: Photos or videos of extreme graphic violence, posts encouraging violence, specific threats of physical harm

fields.name: child_porn
fields.description_en: Posts with photos or videos of sexual intercourse with children, posts of nude/partially nude children.
fields.description_es: Posts with photos or videos of sexual intercourse with children, posts of nude/partially nude children.

fields.name: illegal
fields.description_en: Posts promoting illegal activities such as use, sale or distribution of hard drugs etc
fields.description_es: Posts promoting illegal activities such as use, sale or distribution of hard drugs etc

fields.name: deceptive
fields.description_en: Posts with purposefully fake or deceitful news, hoax disproved by credible sources
fields.description_es: Posts with purposefully fake or deceitful news, hoax disproved by credible sources

fields.name: copyright
fields.description_en: Posts with content that violates or infringes your copyright.
fields.description_es: Posts with content that violates or infringes your copyright.

fields.name: dont_like_it
fields.description_en: Posts that are distasteful/inappropriate for any other reason not already categorised.
fields.description_es: Posts that are distasteful/inappropriate for any other reason not already categorised.
